section.section: The Montgomery Commission shall provide annually to the county government an audit of each housing project financed by bonds guaranteed by the county.

The audit shall be done by:
an independent certified public accountant licensed by the State; or
a firm of independent certified public accountants licensed by the State.
The accountant or firm of accountants shall provide appropriate certified financial statements and a management letter on the financial soundness of the housing project.

text.section: The county government may undertake financial and compliance audits on housing projects financed by bonds guaranteed under this subtitle.
